description:
Competition in the expert space is growing, do you want to rise above the noise and communicate your business solution so people choose you over your competition? You are in the right place because this online course by Louise Anne Maurice of Fearless Entrepreneur Academy was created for you. 

Consulting Business Promotion: Your Expert Brand Global Plan is for :

  • Consultants who want to dominate their market
  • Coaches who want to be seen as an expert in their niche
  • Business Professionals who want to build their personal brand credibility
  • Entrepreneurs who want to build their business brand credibility
  • Freelancers who want to show-case their knowledge
  • Current Udemy Instructors who want an expert brand

***************************************************************************************************************

Why take Consulting Business Promotion-How to Promote Your Expertise?

You are busy and you don’t want to waste a lot of time and money to learn about essential business communication skills.

This course takes the guess-work out of what is needed to communicate your expertise with the world through teaching online. You walk away with the exact steps you need, in the right order.

What is covered in Consulting Business Promotion: Your Expert Brand Global Plan?

  1. Get the exact planning skills to leverage the Udemy platform to promote your business, build brand awareness and teach your expertise to the world.
  2. Discover effective business communication techniques that promote you and your business as the go-to-expert and authority in your field.
  3. Know precisely how to dominate your niche, be seen as the go to expert in your field and be the first one that media calls when they need questions answered about your topic of expertise.
  4. Uncover the secrets to teach your expertise so that people want to learn more from you and refer business to you.
  5. Confidently design five-star Udemy courses that engage your prospects and clients so that they want to learn more of your expertise.
  6. Walk away with a complete business communication success plan that you can use in 2016 so you share your expertise with a potential 9 million students.

***************************************************************************************************************

How will Consulting Business Promotion: Your Expert Brand Global Plan Benefit You?

I know you are busy and I have meticulously created this course with your success in mind. This training is no-fluff essential information you need to succeed easily and quickly.

Let me show you exactly how to succeed in business by using the Udemy platform to share your expertise with the world and build business brand awareness.

You get insights and step-by-step instruction that show you how to create successful business communication through teaching online.

You get the inside track on what you need to do to become a successful business owner plus the exact plan to make it happen in the right order.

If that's something you would like to achieve, you have selected the right course to take. If you complete this entire course and implement everything you learn you will have a good solid foundation to effectively communicating in business through teaching online.

Remember, it doesn't matter if you are new to business or already in full swing, I've been there and I can show you how to make it happen.

When Can You Take Consulting Business Promotion: Your Expert Brand Global Plan?

What are you waiting for? If you’re looking for a course to learn what it takes to share your expertise with the world and stand above your competition, then look no further.

Start learning right now or take the course when it is convenient for you! The course can be accessed 24-7 from most devices with an internet connection.

Once a member of the course, you receive lecture updates, advice and coaching guidance for life; NO EXTRA COST TO YOU.

Click on the "Start Learning Now" button and start learning instantly

*****************************************************************************************************************
title: Consulting Business Promotion: Your Expert Brand Global Plan
instructors: Fearless Entrepreneur Academy, Louise Anne Maurice
